py.title: ACS Professional Year
py.description: The ACS Professional Year Program in ICT is a 44-52 week course (including 12 weeks of internship) designed to enhance the employability skills of international students who have graduated from a university in Australia. The program aims to provide students with the skills and training they need to start a successful career in the Australian workforce.

postgraduate.title: Postgraduate
postgraduate.description: Study focus more on web full stack developing and mobile apps (iOS and Android).

undergraduate.title: Undergraduate
undergraduate.degree: Bachelor of Designs (Animation and Interactive Media)
undergraduate.description: I did more on 3D animation mostly character animation and 3D environmental modeling.

awards.title: agIdeas NewStar 2013 International Design Competition.
awards.description: Multimedia Entry finalist Melbourne Exhibition and Convention Center – Melbourne, VIC.
